rules_text:
Trample, hexproof
Davijan enters with ten prison counters on it and can't attack or block as long as it has a prison counter on it.
Whenever you cast a spell, remove a prison counter from Davijan. If that spell was a Merfolk, remove two instead. It it was a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent, remove three instead.
